description: A single full-page character gallery introducing the opposing commanders. On the left stands Georg Carl von Döbeln of the Swedish forces, wearing his dark blue uniform with a black headband instead of a hat. Opposite him, the Russian commanders Nikolaj Kamenskij and Kirill Kazatjkovskij stand in formal poses. Background kept minimal — soft neutral tone or faint suggestion of field or camp — focusing on the three figures and their contrast in bearing.
narration: September 1808. Near Nykarleby, two armies prepare to meet at Jutas — Sweden’s last hope of halting the Russian advance.
info: Page 2 – Scene – Slaget vid Jutas (13 September 1808). Characters: Döbeln, Eek, Furuhjelm, Gyllenbögel, Hesselius, Björneborgs regemente / Kamenskij, Kazatjkovskij, Russian Infantry. PageType: Hero (1 panel). Scene: Character gallery.
